Introduction

IB147 is a pre-debut six-member boy group formed by HnA Entertainment. The group name IB147 stands for Idols Boys + 147. The group has six members: Yoonsang, Jooyeong, Zen, Kyul, Beomsoo, and Eun. On, February 14, 2023, they released a pre-debut song titled “Over Shock”.

On April 1, 2024, all members opened an Instagram account. At the same time, IB147′ social media account went inactive. They also stopped their activities. What’s more, Kyul posted a picture of himself with the message “every end is a new beginning” the same. All of this hints at a disbandment.

Yoonsang, Kyul, Beomsoo, and Eun are now in the Pre-Debut group, L5ST, though no official notice has been given. L5ST's Twitter account was opened on August 1st and members revealed on August 4th, 2024.
